meta_info.name: DV_DATE_TIME
meta_info.description: Represents an absolute point in time, specified to the second. Semantics defined by ISO 8601.

functions.name: magnitude
functions.meaning: Numeric value of the date/time as seconds since the calendar origin date/time `0001-01-01T00:00:00Z`.

functions.name: add
functions.meaning: Addition of a Duration to this Date/time.

functions.name: subtract
functions.meaning: Subtract a Duration from this Date/time.

functions.name: less_than
functions.meaning: True if this date-time object is less than `_other_`, based on comparison of `_magnitude()_`.
